title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: expire that year, select, as their last official act, the one of their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: colleagues left on the bench whom they deem fittest to fill it."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "There being no legal profession to serve as a school for judges," I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: said, "they must, of course, come directly from the law school to the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: bench."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "We have no such things as law schools," replied the doctor smiling.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The law as a special science is obsolete. It was a system of casuistry
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: which the elaborate artificiality of the old order of society
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: absolutely required to interpret it, but only a few of the plainest and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: simplest legal maxims have any application to the existing state of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: world. Everything touching the relations of men to one another is now
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: simpler, beyond any comparison, than in your day. We should have no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sort of use for the hair-splitting experts who presided and argued in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: your courts. You must not imagine, however, that we have any disrespect
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for those ancient worthies because we have no use for them. On the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: contrary, we entertain an unfeigned respect, amounting almost to awe,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for the men who alone understood and were able to expound the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: interminable complexity of the rights of property, and the relations of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: commercial and personal dependence involved in your system. What,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: indeed, could possibly give a more powerful impression of the intricacy
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and artificiality of that system than the fact that it was necessary to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: set apart from other pursuits the cream of the intellect of every
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: generation, in order to provide a body of pundits able to make it even
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: vaguely intelligible to those whose fates it determined. The treatises
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of your great lawyers, the works of Blackstone and Chitty, of Story and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Parsons, stand in our museums, side by side with the tomes of Duns
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Scotus and his fellow scholastics, as curious monuments of intellectual
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: subtlety devoted to subjects equally remote from the interests of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: modern men. Our judges are simply widely informed, judicious, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: discreet men of ripe years.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I should not fail to speak of one important function of the minor
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: judges," added Dr. Leete. "This is to adjudicate all cases where a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: private of the industrial army makes a complaint of unfairness against
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: an officer. All such questions are heard and settled without appeal by
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a single judge, three judges being required only in graver cases. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: efficiency of industry requires the strictest discipline in the army of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: labor, but the claim of the workman to just and considerate treatment
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is backed by the whole power of the nation. The officer commands and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the private obeys, but no officer is so high that he would dare display
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: an overbearing manner toward a workman of the lowest class. As for
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: churlishness or rudeness by an official of any sort, in his relations
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to the public, not one among minor offenses is more sure of a prompt
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: penalty than this. Not only justice but civility is enforced by our
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: judges in all sorts of intercourse. No value of service is accepted as
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a set-off to boorish or offensive manners."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: It occurred to me, as Dr. Leete was speaking, that in all his talk I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had heard much of the nation and nothing of the state governments. Had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the organization of the nation as an industrial unit done away with the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: states? I asked.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Necessarily," he replied. "The state governments would have interfered
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with the control and discipline of the industrial army, which, of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: course, required to be central and uniform. Even if the state
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: governments had not become inconvenient for other reasons, they were
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: rendered superfluous by the prodigious simplification in the task of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: government since your day. Almost the sole function of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: administration now is that of directing the industries of the country.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Most of the purposes for which governments formerly existed no longer
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: remain to be subserved. We have no army or navy, and no military
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: organization. We have no departments of state or treasury, no excise or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: revenue services, no taxes or tax collectors. The only function proper
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of government, as known to you, which still remains, is the judiciary
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and police system. I have already explained to you how simple is our
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: judicial system as compared with your huge and complex machine. Of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: course the same absence of crime and temptation to it, which make the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: duties of judges so light, reduces the number and duties of the police
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to a minimum."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "But with no state legislatures, and Congress meeting only once in five
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: years, how do you get your legislation done?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "We have no legislation," replied Dr. Leete, "that is, next to none. It
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is rarely that Congress, even when it meets, considers any new laws of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consequence, and then it only has power to commend them to the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: following Congress, lest anything be done hastily. If you will consider
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a moment, Mr. West, you will see that we have nothing to make laws
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887

author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Chapter 20
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: That afternoon Edith casually inquired if I had yet revisited the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: underground chamber in the garden in which I had been found.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Not yet," I replied. "To be frank, I have shrunk thus far from doing
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: so, lest the visit might revive old associations rather too strongly
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for my mental equilibrium."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Ah, yes!" she said, "I can imagine that you have done well to stay
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: away. I ought to have thought of that."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "No," I said, "I am glad you spoke of it. The danger, if there was any,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: existed only during the first day or two. Thanks to you, chiefly and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: always, I feel my footing now so firm in this new world, that if you
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: will go with me to keep the ghosts off, I should really like to visit
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the place this afternoon."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Edith demurred at first, but, finding that I was in earnest, consented
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to accompany me. The rampart of earth thrown up from the excavation was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: visible among the trees from the house, and a few steps brought us to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the spot. All remained as it was at the point when work was interrupted
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: by the discovery of the tenant of the chamber, save that the door had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: been opened and the slab from the roof replaced. Descending the sloping
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sides of the excavation, we went in at the door and stood within the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: dimly lighted room.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Everything was just as I had beheld it last on that evening one hundred
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and thirteen years previous, just before closing my eyes for that long
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sleep. I stood for some time silently looking about me. I saw that my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: companion was furtively regarding me with an expression of awed and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sympathetic curiosity. I put out my hand to her and she placed hers in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it, the soft fingers responding with a reassuring pressure to my clasp.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Finally she whispered, "Had we not better go out now? You must not try
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: yourself too far. Oh, how strange it must be to you!"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "On the contrary," I replied, "it does not seem strange; that is the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: strangest part of it."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Not strange?" she echoed.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Even so," I replied. "The emotions with which you evidently credit me,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and which I anticipated would attend this visit, I simply do not feel.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I realize all that these surroundings suggest, but without the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: agitation I expected. You can't be nearly as much surprised at this as
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I am myself. Ever since that terrible morning when you came to my help,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I have tried to avoid thinking of my former life, just as I have
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: avoided coming here, for fear of the agitating effects. I am for all
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the world like a man who has permitted an injured limb to lie
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: motionless under the impression that it is exquisitely sensitive, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on trying to move it finds that it is paralyzed."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Do you mean your memory is gone?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Not at all. I remember everything connected with my former life, but
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with a total lack of keen sensation. I remember it for clearness as if
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it had been but a day since then, but my feelings about what I remember
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: are as faint as if to my consciousness, as well as in fact, a hundred
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: years had intervened. Perhaps it is possible to explain this, too. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: effect of change in surroundings is like that of lapse of time in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: making the past seem remote. When I first woke from that trance, my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: former life appeared as yesterday, but now, since I have learned to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: know my new surroundings, and to realize the prodigious changes that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have transformed the world, I no longer find it hard, but very easy, to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: realize that I have slept a century. Can you conceive of such a thing
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as living a hundred years in four days? It really seems to me that I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have done just that, and that it is this experience which has given so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: remote and unreal an appearance to my former life. Can you see how such
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a thing might be?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I can conceive it," replied Edith, meditatively, "and I think we ought
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: all to be thankful that it is so, for it will save you much suffering,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I am sure."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Imagine," I said, in an effort to explain, as much to myself as to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: her, the strangeness of my mental condition, "that a man first heard of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a bereavement many, many years, half a lifetime perhaps, after the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: event occurred. I fancy his feeling would be perhaps something as mine
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is. When I think of my friends in the world of that former day, and the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sorrow they must have felt for me, it is with a pensive pity, rather
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: than keen anguish, as of a sorrow long, long ago ended."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "You have told us nothing yet of your friends," said Edith. "Had you
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: many to mourn you?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Thank God, I had very few relatives, none nearer than cousins," I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: replied. "But there was one, not a relative, but dearer to me than any
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: kin of blood. She had your name. She was to have been my wife soon. Ah
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: me!"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Ah me!" sighed the Edith by my side. "Think of the heartache she must
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have had."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Something in the deep feeling of this gentle girl touched a chord in my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: benumbed heart. My eyes, before so dry, were flooded with the tears
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that had till now refused to come. When I had regained my composure, I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: saw that she too had been weeping freely.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "God bless your tender heart," I said. "Would you like to see her
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: picture?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: A small locket with Edith Bartlett's picture, secured about my neck
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with a gold chain, had lain upon my breast all through that long sleep,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and removing this I opened and gave it to my companion. She took it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with eagerness, and after poring long over the sweet face, touched the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: picture with her lips.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I know that she was good and lovely enough to well deserve your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: tears," she said; "but remember her heartache was over long ago, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: she has been in heaven for nearly a century."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: It was indeed so. Whatever her sorrow had once been, for nearly a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: century she had ceased to weep, and, my sudden passion spent, my own
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: tears dried away. I had loved her very dearly in my other life, but it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: was a hundred years ago! I do not know but some may find in this
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: confession evidence of lack of feeling, but I think, perhaps, that none
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: can have had an experience sufficiently like mine to enable them to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: judge me. As we were about to leave the chamber, my eye rested upon the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: great iron safe which stood in one corner. Calling my companion's
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: attention to it, I said:

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "This was my strong room as well as my sleeping room. In the safe

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: yonder are several thousand dollars in gold, and any amount of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: securities. If I had known when I went to sleep that night just how
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: long my nap would be, I should still have thought that the gold was a

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: safe provision for my needs in any country or any century, however

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: distant. That a time would ever come when it would lose its purchasing

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: power, I should have considered the wildest of fancies. Nevertheless,

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: here I wake up to find myself among a people of whom a cartload of gold

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: will not procure a loaf of bread."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: As might be expected, I did not succeed in impressing Edith that there

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: was anything remarkable in this fact. "Why in the world should it?" she

author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: It had been suggested by Dr. Leete that we should devote the next
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: morning to an inspection of the schools and colleges of the city, with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: some attempt on his own part at an explanation of the educational
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: system of the twentieth century.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "You will see," said he, as we set out after breakfast, "many very
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: important differences between our methods of education and yours, but
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the main difference is that nowadays all persons equally have those
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: opportunities of higher education which in your day only an
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: infinitesimal portion of the population enjoyed. We should think we had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: gained nothing worth speaking of, in equalizing the physical comfort of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: men, without this educational equality."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The cost must be very great," I said.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "If it took half the revenue of the nation, nobody would grudge it,"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: replied Dr. Leete, "nor even if it took it all save a bare pittance.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: But in truth the expense of educating ten thousand youth is not ten nor
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: five times that of educating one thousand. The principle which makes
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: all operations on a large scale proportionally cheaper than on a small
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: scale holds as to education also."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "College education was terribly expensive in my day," said I.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "If I have not been misinformed by our historians," Dr. Leete answered,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "it was not college education but college dissipation and extravagance
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: which cost so highly. The actual expense of your colleges appears to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have been very low, and would have been far lower if their patronage
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had been greater. The higher education nowadays is as cheap as the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: lower, as all grades of teachers, like all other workers, receive the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: same support. We have simply added to the common school system of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: compulsory education, in vogue in Massachusetts a hundred years ago, a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: half dozen higher grades, carrying the youth to the age of twenty-one
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and giving him what you used to call the education of a gentleman,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: instead of turning him loose at fourteen or fifteen with no mental
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: equipment beyond reading, writing, and the multiplication table."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Setting aside the actual cost of these additional years of education,"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I replied, "we should not have thought we could afford the loss of time
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: from industrial pursuits. Boys of the poorer classes usually went to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: work at sixteen or younger, and knew their trade at twenty."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "We should not concede you any gain even in material product by that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: plan," Dr. Leete replied. "The greater efficiency which education gives
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to all sorts of labor, except the rudest, makes up in a short period
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for the time lost in acquiring it."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "We should also have been afraid," said I, "that a high education,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: while it adapted men to the professions, would set them against manual
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: labor of all sorts."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "That was the effect of high education in your day, I have read,"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: replied the doctor; "and it was no wonder, for manual labor meant
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: association with a rude, coarse, and ignorant class of people. There is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: no such class now. It was inevitable that such a feeling should exist
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: then, for the further reason that all men receiving a high education

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: were understood to be destined for the professions or for wealthy
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: leisure, and such an education in one neither rich nor professional was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a proof of disappointed aspirations, an evidence of failure, a badge of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: inferiority rather than superiority. Nowadays, of course, when the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: highest education is deemed necessary to fit a man merely to live,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: without any reference to the sort of work he may do, its possession
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: conveys no such implication."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "After all," I remarked, "no amount of education can cure natural
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: dullness or make up for original mental deficiencies. Unless the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: average natural mental capacity of men is much above its level in my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: day, a high education must be pretty nearly thrown away on a large
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: element of the population. We used to hold that a certain amount of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: susceptibility to educational influences is required to make a mind
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: worth cultivating, just as a certain natural fertility in soil is

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: required if it is to repay tilling."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Ah," said Dr. Leete, "I am glad you used that illustration, for it is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: just the one I would have chosen to set forth the modern view of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: education. You say that land so poor that the product will not repay
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the labor of tilling is not cultivated. Nevertheless, much land that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: does not begin to repay tilling by its product was cultivated in your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: day and is in ours. I refer to gardens, parks, lawns, and, in general,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to pieces of land so situated that, were they left to grow up to weeds
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and briers, they would be eyesores and inconveniencies to all about.

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: They are therefore tilled, and though their product is little, there is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: yet no land that, in a wider sense, better repays cultivation. So it is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with the men and women with whom we mingle in the relations of society,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: whose voices are always in our ears, whose behavior in innumerable ways
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: affects our enjoyment--who are, in fact, as much conditions of our

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: lives as the air we breathe, or any of the physical elements on which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: we depend. If, indeed, we could not afford to educate everybody, we
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: should choose the coarsest and dullest by nature, rather than the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: brightest, to receive what education we could give. The naturally
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: refined and intellectual can better dispense with aids to culture than
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: those less fortunate in natural endowments.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "To borrow a phrase which was often used in your day, we should not
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consider life worth living if we had to be surrounded by a population
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of ignorant, boorish, coarse, wholly uncultivated men and women, as was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the plight of the few educated in your day. Is a man satisfied, merely
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: because he is perfumed himself, to mingle with a malodorous crowd?
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Could he take more than a very limited satisfaction, even in a palatial
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: apartment, if the windows on all four sides opened into stable yards?
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: And yet just that was the situation of those considered most fortunate
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as to culture and refinement in your day. I know that the poor and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ignorant envied the rich and cultured then; but to us the latter,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: living as they did, surrounded by squalor and brutishness, seem little
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: better off than the former. The cultured man in your age was like one
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: up to the neck in a nauseous bog solacing himself with a smelling
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: bottle. You see, perhaps, now, how we look at this question of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: universal high education. No single thing is so important to every man
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as to have for neighbors intelligent, companionable persons. There is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nothing, therefore, which the nation can do for him that will enhance
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: so much his own happiness as to educate his neighbors. When it fails to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: do so, the value of his own education to him is reduced by half, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: many of the tastes he has cultivated are made positive sources of pain.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "To educate some to the highest degree, and leave the mass wholly
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: uncultivated, as you did, made the gap between them almost like that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: between different natural species, which have no means of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: communication. What could be more inhuman than this consequence of a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: partial enjoyment of education! Its universal and equal enjoyment
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: leaves, indeed, the differences between men as to natural endowments as
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: marked as in a state of nature, but the level of the lowest is vastly
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: raised. Brutishness is eliminated. All have some inkling of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: humanities, some appreciation of the things of the mind, and an
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: admiration for the still higher culture they have fallen short of. They
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have become capable of receiving and imparting, in various degrees, but
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: all in some measure, the pleasures and inspirations of a refined social
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: life. The cultured society of the nineteenth century--what did it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consist of but here and there a few microscopic oases in a vast,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: unbroken wilderness? The proportion of individuals capable of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: intellectual sympathies or refined intercourse, to the mass of their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: contemporaries, used to be so infinitesimal as to be in any broad view
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of humanity scarcely worth mentioning. One generation of the world
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to-day represents a greater volume of intellectual life than any five
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: centuries ever did before.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "There is still another point I should mention in stating the grounds
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on which nothing less than the universality of the best education could
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: now be tolerated," continued Dr. Leete, "and that is, the interest of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the coming generation in having educated parents. To put the matter in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a nutshell, there are three main grounds on which our educational
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: system rests: first, the right of every man to the completest education
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the nation can give him on his own account, as necessary to his
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: enjoyment of himself; second, the right of his fellow-citizens to have
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: him educated, as necessary to their enjoyment of his society; third,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the right of the unborn to be guaranteed an intelligent and refined
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: parentage."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I shall not describe in detail what I saw in the schools that day.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Having taken but slight interest in educational matters in my former
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: life, I could offer few comparisons of interest. Next to the fact of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the universality of the higher as well as the lower education, I was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: most struck with the prominence given to physical culture, and the fact
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that proficiency in athletic feats and games as well as in scholarship
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had a place in the rating of the youth.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The faculty of education," Dr. Leete explained, "is held to the same
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: responsibility for the bodies as for the minds of its charges. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: highest possible physical, as well as mental, development of every one
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is the double object of a curriculum which lasts from the age of six to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that of twenty-one."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The magnificent health of the young people in the schools impressed me
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: strongly. My previous observations, not only of the notable personal
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: endowments of the family of my host, but of the people I had seen in my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: walks abroad, had already suggested the idea that there must have been
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: something like a general improvement in the physical standard of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: race since my day, and now, as I compared these stalwart young men and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: fresh, vigorous maidens with the young people I had seen in the schools
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of the nineteenth century, I was moved to impart my thought to Dr.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Leete. He listened with great interest to what I said.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Your testimony on this point," he declared, "is invaluable. We believe
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that there has been such an improvement as you speak of, but of course
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it could only be a matter of theory with us. It is an incident of your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: unique position that you alone in the world of to-day can speak with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: authority on this point. Your opinion, when you state it publicly,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: will, I assure you, make a profound sensation. For the rest it would be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: strange, certainly, if the race did not show an improvement. In your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: day, riches debauched one class with idleness of mind and body, while
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: poverty sapped the vitality of the masses by overwork, bad food, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: pestilent homes. The labor required of children, and the burdens laid
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on women, enfeebled the very springs of life. Instead of these
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: maleficent circumstances, all now enjoy the most favorable conditions
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of physical life; the young are carefully nurtured and studiously cared
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for; the labor which is required of all is limited to the period of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: greatest bodily vigor, and is never excessive; care for one's self and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: one's family, anxiety as to livelihood, the strain of a ceaseless
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: battle for life--all these influences, which once did so much to wreck
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the minds and bodies of men and women, are known no more. Certainly, an
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: improvement of the species ought to follow such a change. In certain
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: place. Insanity, for instance, which in the nineteenth century was so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: terribly common a product of your insane mode of life, has almost
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: disappeared, with its alternative, suicide."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Chapter 22
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: We had made an appointment to meet the ladies at the dining-hall for
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: dinner, after which, having some engagement, they left us sitting at
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: table there, discussing our wine and cigars with a multitude of other
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: matters.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Doctor," said I, in the course of our talk, "morally speaking, your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: social system is one which I should be insensate not to admire in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: comparison with any previously in vogue in the world, and especially
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with that of my own most unhappy century. If I were to fall into a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: mesmeric sleep tonight as lasting as that other and meanwhile the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: course of time were to take a turn backward instead of forward, and I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: were to wake up again in the nineteenth century, when I had told my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: friends what I had seen, they would every one admit that your world was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a paradise of order, equity, and felicity. But they were a very
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: practical people, my contemporaries, and after expressing their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: admiration for the moral beauty and material splendor of the system,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: they would presently begin to cipher and ask how you got the money to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: make everybody so happy; for certainly, to support the whole nation at
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a rate of comfort, and even luxury, such as I see around me, must
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: involve vastly greater wealth than the nation produced in my day. Now,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: while I could explain to them pretty nearly everything else of the main
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: features of your system, I should quite fail to answer this question,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and failing there, they would tell me, for they were very close
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: cipherers, that I had been dreaming; nor would they ever believe
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: anything else. In my day, I know that the total annual product of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nation, although it might have been divided with absolute equality,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: would not have come to more than three or four hundred dollars per
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: head, not very much more than enough to supply the necessities of life
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with few or any of its comforts. How is it that you have so much more?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "That is a very pertinent question, Mr. West," replied Dr. Leete, "and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I should not blame your friends, in the case you supposed, if they
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: declared your story all moonshine, failing a satisfactory reply to it.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: It is a question which I cannot answer exhaustively at any one sitting,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and as for the exact statistics to bear out my general statements, I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: shall have to refer you for them to books in my library, but it would
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: certainly be a pity to leave you to be put to confusion by your old
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: acquaintances, in case of the contingency you speak of, for lack of a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: few suggestions.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Let us begin with a number of small items wherein we economize wealth
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as compared with you. We have no national, state, county, or municipal
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: debts, or payments on their account. We have no sort of military or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: naval expenditures for men or materials, no army, navy, or militia. We
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have no revenue service, no swarm of tax assessors and collectors. As
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: regards our judiciary, police, sheriffs, and jailers, the force which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Massachusetts alone kept on foot in your day far more than suffices for
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the nation now. We have no criminal class preying upon the wealth of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: society as you had. The number of persons, more or less absolutely lost
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to the working force through physical disability, of the lame, sick,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and debilitated, which constituted such a burden on the able-bodied in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: your day, now that all live under conditions of health and comfort, has
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: shrunk to scarcely perceptible proportions, and with every generation
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is becoming more completely eliminated.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Another item wherein we save is the disuse of money and the thousand
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: occupations connected with financial operations of all sorts, whereby
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: an army of men was formerly taken away from useful employments. Also
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consider that the waste of the very rich in your day on inordinate
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: personal luxury has ceased, though, indeed, this item might easily be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: over-estimated. Again, consider that there are no idlers now, rich or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: poor--no drones.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "A very important cause of former poverty was the vast waste of labor
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and materials which resulted from domestic washing and cooking, and the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: performing separately of innumerable other tasks to which we apply the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: cooperative plan.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "A larger economy than any of these--yes, of all together--is effected
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: by the organization of our distributing system, by which the work done
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: once by the merchants, traders, storekeepers, with their various grades
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of jobbers, wholesalers, retailers, agents, commercial travelers, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: middlemen of all sorts, with an excessive waste of energy in needless
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: transportation and interminable handlings, is performed by one tenth
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the number of hands and an unnecessary turn of not one wheel. Something
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of what our distributing system is like you know. Our statisticians
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: calculate that one eightieth part of our workers suffices for all the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: processes of distribution which in your day required one eighth of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: population, so much being withdrawn from the force engaged in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: productive labor."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I begin to see," I said, "where you get your greater wealth."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I beg your pardon," replied Dr. Leete, "but you scarcely do as yet.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The economies I have mentioned thus far, in the aggregate, considering
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the labor they would save directly and indirectly through saving of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: material, might possibly be equivalent to the addition to your annual
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: production of wealth of one half its former total. These items are,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: however, scarcely worth mentioning in comparison with other prodigious
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: wastes, now saved, which resulted inevitably from leaving the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: industries of the nation to private enterprise. However great the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: economies your contemporaries might have devised in the consumption of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: products, and however marvelous the progress of mechanical invention,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: they could never have raised themselves out of the slough of poverty so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: long as they held to that system.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "No mode more wasteful for utilizing human energy could be devised, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for the credit of the human intellect it should be remembered that the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: system never was devised, but was merely a survival from the rude ages
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: when the lack of social organization made any sort of cooperation
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: impossible."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I will readily admit," I said, "that our industrial system was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ethically very bad, but as a mere wealth-making machine, apart from
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: moral aspects, it seemed to us admirable."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "As I said," responded the doctor, "the subject is too large to discuss
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: at length now, but if you are really interested to know the main
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: criticisms which we moderns make on your industrial system as compared
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with our own, I can touch briefly on some of them.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The wastes which resulted from leaving the conduct of industry to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: irresponsible individuals, wholly without mutual understanding or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: concert, were mainly four: first, the waste by mistaken undertakings;
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: second, the waste from the competition and mutual hostility of those
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: engaged in industry; third, the waste by periodical gluts and crises,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with the consequent interruptions of industry; fourth, the waste from
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: idle capital and labor, at all times. Any one of these four great
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: leaks, were all the others stopped, would suffice to make the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: difference between wealth and poverty on the part of a nation.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Take the waste by mistaken undertakings, to begin with. In your day
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the production and distribution of commodities being without concert or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: organization, there was no means of knowing just what demand there was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for any class of products, or what was the rate of supply. Therefore,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: any enterprise by a private capitalist was always a doubtful
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: experiment. The projector having no general view of the field of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: industry and consumption, such as our government has, could never be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sure either what the people wanted, or what arrangements other
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: capitalists were making to supply them. In view of this, we are not
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: surprised to learn that the chances were considered several to one in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: favor of the failure of any given business enterprise, and that it was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: common for persons who at last succeeded in making a hit to have failed
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: repeatedly. If a shoemaker, for every pair of shoes he succeeded in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: completing, spoiled the leather of four or five pair, besides losing
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the time spent on them, he would stand about the same chance of getting
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: rich as your contemporaries did with their system of private
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: enterprise, and its average of four or five failures to one success.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The next of the great wastes was that from competition. The field of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: industry was a battlefield as wide as the world, in which the workers
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: wasted, in assailing one another, energies which, if expended in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: concerted effort, as to-day, would have enriched all. As for mercy or

text: "The national party!" I exclaimed. "That must have arisen after my day.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I suppose it was one of the labor parties."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Oh no!" replied the doctor. "The labor parties, as such, never could
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have accomplished anything on a large or permanent scale. For purposes
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of national scope, their basis as merely class organizations was too
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: narrow. It was not till a rearrangement of the industrial and social
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: system on a higher ethical basis, and for the more efficient production
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of wealth, was recognized as the interest, not of one class, but
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and young, weak and strong, men and women, that there was any prospect
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that it would be achieved. Then the national party arose to carry it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: out by political methods. It probably took that name because its aim

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: was to nationalize the functions of production and distribution.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Indeed, it could not well have had any other name, for its purpose was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to realize the idea of the nation with a grandeur and completeness
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: never before conceived, not as an association of men for certain merely
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: political functions affecting their happiness only remotely and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: superficially, but as a family, a vital union, a common life, a mighty
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: heaven-touching tree whose leaves are its people, fed from its veins,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and feeding it in turn. The most patriotic of all possible parties, it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sought to justify patriotism and raise it from an instinct to a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: rational devotion, by making the native land truly a father land, a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: father who kept the people alive and was not merely an idol for which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: they were expected to die."

text: Chapter 25
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The personality of Edith Leete had naturally impressed me strongly ever
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: since I had come, in so strange a manner, to be an inmate of her
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: father's house, and it was to be expected that after what had happened
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the night previous, I should be more than ever preoccupied with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: thoughts of her. From the first I had been struck with the air of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: serene frankness and ingenuous directness, more like that of a noble
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and innocent boy than any girl I had ever known, which characterized
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: her. I was curious to know how far this charming quality might be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: peculiar to herself, and how far possibly a result of alterations in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the social position of women which might have taken place since my
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: time. Finding an opportunity that day, when alone with Dr. Leete, I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: turned the conversation in that direction.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I suppose," I said, "that women nowadays, having been relieved of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: burden of housework, have no employment but the cultivation of their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: charms and graces."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "So far as we men are concerned," replied Dr. Leete, "we should
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consider that they amply paid their way, to use one of your forms of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: expression, if they confined themselves to that occupation, but you may
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: be very sure that they have quite too much spirit to consent to be mere
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: beneficiaries of society, even as a return for ornamenting it. They
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: did, indeed, welcome their riddance from housework, because that was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: not only exceptionally wearing in itself, but also wasteful, in the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: extreme, of energy, as compared with the cooperative plan; but they
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: accepted relief from that sort of work only that they might contribute
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: in other and more effectual, as well as more agreeable, ways to the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: common weal. Our women, as well as our men, are members of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: industrial army, and leave it only when maternal duties claim them. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: result is that most women, at one time or another of their lives, serve
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: industrially some five or ten or fifteen years, while those who have no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: children fill out the full term."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "A woman does not, then, necessarily leave the industrial service on
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: marriage?" I queried.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "No more than a man," replied the doctor. "Why on earth should she?
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Married women have no housekeeping responsibilities now, you know, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a husband is not a baby that he should be cared for."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "It was thought one of the most grievous features of our civilization
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: that we required so much toil from women," I said; "but it seems to me
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: you get more out of them than we did."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Dr. Leete laughed. "Indeed we do, just as we do out of our men. Yet the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: women of this age are very happy, and those of the nineteenth century,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: unless contemporary references greatly mislead us, were very miserable.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The reason that women nowadays are so much more efficient colaborers
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with the men, and at the same time are so happy, is that, in regard to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: their work as well as men's, we follow the principle of providing every
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: one the kind of occupation he or she is best adapted to. Women being
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: inferior in strength to men, and further disqualified industrially in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: special ways, the kinds of occupation reserved for them, and the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: conditions under which they pursue them, have reference to these facts.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The heavier sorts of work are everywhere reserved for men, the lighter
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: occupations for women. Under no circumstances is a woman permitted to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: follow any employment not perfectly adapted, both as to kind and degree
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of labor, to her sex. Moreover, the hours of women's work are
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: considerably shorter than those of men's, more frequent vacations are
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: granted, and the most careful provision is made for rest when needed.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The men of this day so well appreciate that they owe to the beauty and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: grace of women the chief zest of their lives and their main incentive
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to effort, that they permit them to work at all only because it is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: fully understood that a certain regular requirement of labor, of a sort
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: adapted to their powers, is well for body and mind, during the period
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of maximum physical vigor. We believe that the magnificent health which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: distinguishes our women from those of your day, who seem to have been
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: so generally sickly, is owing largely to the fact that all alike are
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: furnished with healthful and inspiriting occupation."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I understood you," I said, "that the women-workers belong to the army
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of industry, but how can they be under the same system of ranking and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: discipline with the men, when the conditions of their labor are so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: different?"
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "They are under an entirely different discipline," replied Dr. Leete,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "and constitute rather an allied force than an integral part of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: army of the men. They have a woman general-in-chief and are under
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: exclusively feminine regime. This general, as also the higher officers,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: is chosen by the body of women who have passed the time of service, in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: correspondence with the manner in which the chiefs of the masculine
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: army and the President of the nation are elected. The general of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward
