title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: measures respecting women's work, pending appeals to Congress. I should
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: have said, in speaking of the judiciary, that we have women on the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: bench, appointed by the general of the women, as well as men. Causes in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: which both parties are women are determined by women judges, and where
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a man and a woman are parties to a case, a judge of either sex must
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: consent to the verdict."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Womanhood seems to be organized as a sort of imperium in imperio in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: your system," I said.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "To some extent," Dr. Leete replied; "but the inner imperium is one
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: from which you will admit there is not likely to be much danger to the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nation. The lack of some such recognition of the distinct individuality
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of the sexes was one of the innumerable defects of your society. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: passional attraction between men and women has too often prevented a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: perception of the profound differences which make the members of each
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sex in many things strange to the other, and capable of sympathy only
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with their own. It is in giving full play to the differences of sex
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: rather than in seeking to obliterate them, as was apparently the effort
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of some reformers in your day, that the enjoyment of each by itself and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the piquancy which each has for the other, are alike enhanced. In your
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: day there was no career for women except in an unnatural rivalry with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: men. We have given them a world of their own, with its emulations,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ambitions, and careers, and I assure you they are very happy in it. It
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: seems to us that women were more than any other class the victims of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: your civilization. There is something which, even at this distance of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: time, penetrates one with pathos in the spectacle of their ennuied,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: undeveloped lives, stunted at marriage, their narrow horizon, bounded
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: so often, physically, by the four walls of home, and morally by a petty
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: circle of personal interests. I speak now, not of the poorer classes,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: who were generally worked to death, but also of the well-to-do and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: rich. From the great sorrows, as well as the petty frets of life, they
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had no refuge in the breezy outdoor world of human affairs, nor any
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: interests save those of the family. Such an existence would have
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: softened men's brains or driven them mad. All that is changed to-day.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: No woman is heard nowadays wishing she were a man, nor parents desiring
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: boy rather than girl children. Our girls are as full of ambition for
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: their careers as our boys. Marriage, when it comes, does not mean
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: incarceration for them, nor does it separate them in any way from the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: larger interests of society, the bustling life of the world. Only when
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: maternity fills a woman's mind with new interests does she withdraw
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: from the world for a time. Afterward, and at any time, she may return
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to her place among her comrades, nor need she ever lose touch with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: them. Women are a very happy race nowadays, as compared with what they
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ever were before in the world's history, and their power of giving
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: happiness to men has been of course increased in proportion."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "I should imagine it possible," I said, "that the interest which girls
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for its distinctions might have an effect to deter them from marriage."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on, their attraction for each other should remain constant. The mere
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

author: Bellamy, Edward

text: trembled, was not worth a share even in this era of fruition?
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "You know the story of that last, greatest, and most bloodless of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: revolutions. In the time of one generation men laid aside the social
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: traditions and practices of barbarians, and assumed a social order
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: worthy of rational and human beings. Ceasing to be predatory in their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: habits, they became co-workers, and found in fraternity, at once, the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: science of wealth and happiness. 'What shall I eat and drink, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: wherewithal shall I be clothed?' stated as a problem beginning and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ending in self, had been an anxious and an endless one. But when once
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it was conceived, not from the individual, but the fraternal
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: standpoint, 'What shall we eat and drink, and wherewithal shall we be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: clothed?'--its difficulties vanished.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Poverty with servitude had been the result, for the mass of humanity,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of attempting to solve the problem of maintenance from the individual
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: standpoint, but no sooner had the nation become the sole capitalist and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: employer than not alone did plenty replace poverty, but the last
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: vestige of the serfdom of man to man disappeared from earth. Human
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: slavery, so often vainly scotched, at last was killed. The means of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: subsistence no longer doled out by men to women, by employer to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: employed, by rich to poor, was distributed from a common stock as among
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: children at the father's table. It was impossible for a man any longer
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: to use his fellow-men as tools for his own profit. His esteem was the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: only sort of gain he could thenceforth make out of him. There was no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: more either arrogance or servility in the relations of human beings to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: one another. For the first time since the creation every man stood up
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: straight before God. The fear of want and the lust of gain became
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: extinct motives when abundance was assured to all and immoderate
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: possessions made impossible of attainment. There were no more beggars
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nor almoners. Equity left charity without an occupation. The ten
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: commandments became well nigh obsolete in a world where there was no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: temptation to theft, no occasion to lie either for fear or favor, no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: room for envy where all were equal, and little provocation to violence
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: where men were disarmed of power to injure one another. Humanity's
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: ancient dream of liberty, equality, fraternity, mocked by so many ages,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: at last was realized.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "As in the old society the generous, the just, the tender-hearted had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: been placed at a disadvantage by the possession of those qualities; so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: in the new society the cold-hearted, the greedy, and self-seeking found
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: themselves out of joint with the world. Now that the conditions of life
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: for the first time ceased to operate as a forcing process to develop
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the brutal qualities of human nature, and the premium which had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: heretofore encouraged selfishness was not only removed, but placed upon
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: unselfishness, it was for the first time possible to see what
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: unperverted human nature really was like. The depraved tendencies,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: which had previously overgrown and obscured the better to so large an
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: extent, now withered like cellar fungi in the open air, and the nobler
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: qualities showed a sudden luxuriance which turned cynics into
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: panegyrists and for the first time in human history tempted mankind to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: fall in love with itself. Soon was fully revealed, what the divines and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: philosophers of the old world never would have believed, that human
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nature in its essential qualities is good, not bad, that men by their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: natural intention and structure are generous, not selfish, pitiful, not
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: cruel, sympathetic, not arrogant, godlike in aspirations, instinct with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: divinest impulses of tenderness and self-sacrifice, images of God
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: indeed, not the travesties upon Him they had seemed. The constant
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: pressure, through numberless generations, of conditions of life which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: might have perverted angels, had not been able to essentially alter the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: natural nobility of the stock, and these conditions once removed, like
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a bent tree, it had sprung back to its normal uprightness.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "To put the whole matter in the nutshell of a parable, let me compare
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: humanity in the olden time to a rosebush planted in a swamp, watered
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with black bog-water, breathing miasmatic fogs by day, and chilled with
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: poison dews at night. Innumerable generations of gardeners had done
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: their best to make it bloom, but beyond an occasional half-opened bud
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with a worm at the heart, their efforts had been unsuccessful. Many,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: indeed, claimed that the bush was no rosebush at all, but a noxious
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: shrub, fit only to be uprooted and burned. The gardeners, for the most
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: part, however, held that the bush belonged to the rose family, but had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: some ineradicable taint about it, which prevented the buds from coming
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: out, and accounted for its generally sickly condition. There were a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: few, indeed, who maintained that the stock was good enough, that the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: trouble was in the bog, and that under more favorable conditions the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: plant might be expected to do better. But these persons were not
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: regular gardeners, and being condemned by the latter as mere theorists
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and day dreamers, were, for the most part, so regarded by the people.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Moreover, urged some eminent moral philosophers, even conceding for the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sake of the argument that the bush might possibly do better elsewhere,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it was a more valuable discipline for the buds to try to bloom in a bog
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: than it would be under more favorable conditions. The buds that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: succeeded in opening might indeed be very rare, and the flowers pale
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and scentless, but they represented far more moral effort than if they
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had bloomed spontaneously in a garden.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "The regular gardeners and the moral philosophers had their way. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: bush remained rooted in the bog, and the old course of treatment went
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on. Continually new varieties of forcing mixtures were applied to the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: roots, and more recipes than could be numbered, each declared by its
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: advocates the best and only suitable preparation, were used to kill the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: vermin and remove the mildew. This went on a very long time.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Occasionally some one claimed to observe a slight improvement in the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: appearance of the bush, but there were quite as many who declared that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it did not look so well as it used to. On the whole there could not be
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: said to be any marked change. Finally, during a period of general
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: despondency as to the prospects of the bush where it was, the idea of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: transplanting it was again mooted, and this time found favor. 'Let us
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: try it,' was the general voice. 'Perhaps it may thrive better
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: elsewhere, and here it is certainly doubtful if it be worth cultivating
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: longer.' So it came about that the rosebush of humanity was
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: transplanted, and set in sweet, warm, dry earth, where the sun bathed
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: it, the stars wooed it, and the south wind caressed it. Then it
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: appeared that it was indeed a rosebush. The vermin and the mildew
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: disappeared, and the bush was covered with most beautiful red roses,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: whose fragrance filled the world.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "It is a pledge of the destiny appointed for us that the Creator has
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: set in our hearts an infinite standard of achievement, judged by which
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: our past attainments seem always insignificant, and the goal never
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: nearer. Had our forefathers conceived a state of society in which men
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: should live together like brethren dwelling in unity, without strifes
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: or envying, violence or overreaching, and where, at the price of a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: degree of labor not greater than health demands, in their chosen
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: occupations, they should be wholly freed from care for the morrow and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: left with no more concern for their livelihood than trees which are
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: watered by unfailing streams,--had they conceived such a condition, I
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: say, it would have seemed to them nothing less than paradise. They
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: would have confounded it with their idea of heaven, nor dreamed that
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: there could possibly lie further beyond anything to be desired or
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: striven for.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "But how is it with us who stand on this height which they gazed up to?
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Already we have well nigh forgotten, except when it is especially
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: called to our minds by some occasion like the present, that it was not
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: always with men as it is now. It is a strain on our imaginations to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: conceive the social arrangements of our immediate ancestors. We find
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: them grotesque. The solution of the problem of physical maintenance so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as to banish care and crime, so far from seeming to us an ultimate
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: attainment, appears but as a preliminary to anything like real human
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: progress. We have but relieved ourselves of an impertinent and needless
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: harassment which hindered our ancestor from undertaking the real ends
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of existence. We are merely stripped for the race; no more. We are like
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: a child which has just learned to stand upright and to walk. It is a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: great event, from the child's point of view, when he first walks.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Perhaps he fancies that there can be little beyond that achievement,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: but a year later he has forgotten that he could not always walk. His
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: horizon did but widen when he rose, and enlarge as he moved. A great
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: event indeed, in one sense, was his first step, but only as a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: beginning, not as the end. His true career was but then first entered
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on. The enfranchisement of humanity in the last century, from mental
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and physical absorption in working and scheming for the mere bodily
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: necessities, may be regarded as a species of second birth of the race,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: without which its first birth to an existence that was but a burden
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: would forever have remained unjustified, but whereby it is now
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: abundantly vindicated. Since then, humanity has entered on a new phase
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of spiritual development, an evolution of higher faculties, the very
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: existence of which in human nature our ancestors scarcely suspected. In
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: place of the dreary hopelessness of the nineteenth century, its
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: profound pessimism as to the future of humanity, the animating idea of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the present age is an enthusiastic conception of the opportunities of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: our earthly existence, and the unbounded possibilities of human nature.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The betterment of mankind from generation to generation, physically,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: mentally, morally, is recognized as the one great object supremely
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: worthy of effort and of sacrifice. We believe the race for the first
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: time to have entered on the realization of God's ideal of it, and each
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: generation must now be a step upward.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "Do you ask what we look for when unnumbered generations shall have
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: passed away? I answer, the way stretches far before us, but the end is
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: lost in light. For twofold is the return of man to God 'who is our
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: home,' the return of the individual by the way of death, and the return
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of the race by the fulfillment of the evolution, when the divine secret
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: hidden in the germ shall be perfectly unfolded. With a tear for the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: dark past, turn we then to the dazzling future, and, veiling our eyes,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: press forward. The long and weary winter of the race is ended. Its
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: summer has begun. Humanity has burst the chrysalis. The heavens are
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: before it."
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Chapter 27
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: I never could tell just why, but Sunday afternoon during my old life
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had been a time when I was peculiarly subject to melancholy, when the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: color unaccountably faded out of all the aspects of life, and
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: everything appeared pathetically uninteresting. The hours, which in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: general were wont to bear me easily on their wings, lost the power of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: flight, and toward the close of the day, drooping quite to earth, had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: fairly to be dragged along by main strength. Perhaps it was partly
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: owing to the established association of ideas that, despite the utter
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: change in my circumstances, I fell into a state of profound depression
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: on the afternoon of this my first Sunday in the twentieth century.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: It was not, however, on the present occasion a depression without
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: specific cause, the mere vague melancholy I have spoken of, but a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sentiment suggested and certainly quite justified by my position. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: sermon of Mr. Barton, with its constant implication of the vast moral
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: gap between the century to which I belonged and that in which I found
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: myself, had had an effect strongly to accentuate my sense of loneliness
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: in it. Considerately and philosophically as he had spoken, his words
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: could scarcely have failed to leave upon my mind a strong impression of
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the mingled pity, curiosity, and aversion which I, as a representative
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: of an abhorred epoch, must excite in all around me.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The extraordinary kindness with which I had been treated by Dr. Leete
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: and his family, and especially the goodness of Edith, had hitherto
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: prevented my fully realizing that their real sentiment toward me must
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: necessarily be that of the whole generation to which they belonged. The
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: recognition of this, as regarded Dr. Leete and his amiable wife,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: however painful, I might have endured, but the conviction that Edith
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: must share their feeling was more than I could bear.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: The crushing effect with which this belated perception of a fact so
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: obvious came to me opened my eyes fully to something which perhaps the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: reader has already suspected,--I loved Edith.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Was it strange that I did? The affecting occasion on which our intimacy
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: had begun, when her hands had drawn me out of the whirlpool of madness;
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: the fact that her sympathy was the vital breath which had set me up in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: this new life and enabled me to support it; my habit of looking to her
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: as the mediator between me and the world around in a sense that even
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: her father was not,--these were circumstances that had predetermined a
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: result which her remarkable loveliness of person and disposition would
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: alone have accounted for. It was quite inevitable that she should have
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: come to seem to me, in a sense quite different from the usual
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: experience of lovers, the only woman in this world. Now that I had
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: become suddenly sensible of the fatuity of the hopes I had begun to
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: cherish, I suffered not merely what another lover might, but in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: addition a desolate loneliness, an utter forlornness, such as no other
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: lover, however unhappy, could have felt.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: My hosts evidently saw that I was depressed in spirits, and did their
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: best to divert me. Edith especially, I could see, was distressed for
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: me, but according to the usual perversity of lovers, having once been
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: so mad as to dream of receiving something more from her, there was no
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: longer any virtue for me in a kindness that I knew was only sympathy.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: Toward nightfall, after secluding myself in my room most of the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: afternoon, I went into the garden to walk about. The day was overcast,
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: with an autumnal flavor in the warm, still air. Finding myself near the
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: excavation, I entered the subterranean chamber and sat down there.
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: "This," I muttered to myself, "is the only home I have. Let me stay
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: here, and not go forth any more." Seeking aid from the familiar
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: surroundings, I endeavored to find a sad sort of consolation in
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
author: Bellamy, Edward

text: reviving the past and summoning up the forms and faces that were about
title: Looking Backward, 2000 to 1887
